text: Bakhurebanga ibise bieyindukho(eyo). Okhurulila khwayo khuliba lina? Boola; â€œObumanyi bwayo buli khu Nyasaye wenje, abulao umanyile ebise biayo halali ye mwene. Ni isiro mwikulu nende khushialo, shilibetsela tawe halali mapwoka. Bakhurebanga opara mbu newe wayikoonya wayimanya. Boola; obumanyi bwayo buli khu Nyasaye, halali Abandu abanji shibamanyile tawe
